about.heading: I design and build polished apps that convert.
about.pitch: I'm a senior frontend engineer and product designer specializing in fast, accessible, and elegant web experiences. From strategy and UX to modern frontend stacks, I partner with clients to ship with quality and speed.

services.title: Services
services.description: Full-service product design and modern frontend engineering.

items.title: Product UI/UX
items.description: Research, flows, wireframes, and high-fidelity design systems that scale.

items.title: Frontend Engineering
items.description: Vue, TypeScript, and Tailwind engineering with clean, accessible code.

items.title: Performance & SEO
items.description: Core Web Vitals, accessibility audits, and pragmatic performance wins.

items.title: Integrations
items.description: Supabase, Stripe, Sentry, and Zapier workflows wired end-to-end.

items.title: Brand & Visual
items.description: Expressive visual systems, iconography, and on-brand microcopy.

items.title: Ongoing Support
items.description: Roadmaps, maintenance, and quick iterations that keep you ahead.

products.title: Products
products.description: Places where I share content and teach.
products.youtube_description: Subscribe for tutorials, breakdowns, and project walkthroughs.
products.unlock_description: My e-learning platform with courses, workshops, and premium content.

cta.title: Have a project? Let's make it shine.
cta.subtitle: From MVPs to mature products, I partner with teams to deliver results with clarity and craft.

contact.title: Start a project
contact.description: Tell me about your goals and timeline. I'll get back within 1–2 business days.
contact.success_message: Thanks {name}! Your inquiry has been received.

footer.description: Independent designer and frontend engineer crafting fast, delightful web experiences with a bold yellow flair.
footer.available_text: Available for freelance and long-term engagements.
